comment.author: 11296546@N03
comment._content: It appears to be the Detroit Institute of Arts on the immediate right and the Detroit Public Library on the left. Interesting to note the Woodward streetcar tracks are still in the middle of the road at this time ( they stopped running in 1956 ) . This picture appears to have been taken on the roof of a building that now belongs to Wayne State University ( Woodward at Warren Avenue ) .

comment.author: 67343174@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Woodward Sights, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: the thinker statue now sits at the top of the stairs in front of the art institute
